description: Back in November, Kevin declared that the Elegoo Saturn 3 12K was the resin printer you should just buy if you were looking for one. Elegoo is back with the Saturn 4 Ultra that just became available for pre-order; has the King lost his crown? We would like to once again thank Elegoo for generously […]
title: It’s Probably Smarter Than You: Goonhammer Reviews the Saturn 4 Ultra

description: Home stretch!  We’re leaving behind the arid Badlands for the dank and dripping sewers – it’s time to see what the Resurrectionists are up to. Leftovers McMourning and von Schtook are both artists, and dead flesh is their canvas.  Like all creative types, they have their share of failures and bad ideas.  Pobody’s nerfect!  When […]
title: Goonhammer’s Ashes of Malifaux Review Part 7: The Resurrectionists

description: Here at Goonhammer, we know that it’s hard to keep track of all the news happening all the time in the games industry. So much is always going on with games of all sorts, and their related media, it can be a real blink-and-you’ll miss it situation.  That’s why every week, we round up five […]
title: Games Industry News Roundup- April 23rd, 2024

description: Last week we looked at the Stark side of the Riverlands box set. Today, it’s the Lannisters’ turn. The Lannisters Jaime Lannister – Dashing Lion Model Design – I am so sorry to the designer for what I am about to say. Jaime’s model is the worst model in the entire game. His proportions seem […]
title: ASOIAF Tactics – Riverlands Initial Review, Part Two: The Lannisters

description: Hey everyone! I got to take my dinosaurs out for a walk at another Conquest: Last Argument of Kings event and would like to share another event writeup. This took place at Wargames Workshop in Milton Keynes, UK, an awesome venue with lots of breakout rooms, a great supply of nerdy things and most importantly […]
title: Conquest Event – Milton Keynes 2024

description: Welcome back to our Best Year in Gaming March Madness bracket competition! On Saturday we finished off our Sweet Sixteen, and now it’s on to the Elite Eight, with two more matchups today before we head into our final four. Yesterday we watched helplessly as 2004 pounded the crap out of 1991. Meanwhile on the […]
title: The Best Year in Gaming: The Elite Eight, Part Two

description: Travis and Jason are joined by Chris Bacchi from California! The gang catches up to talk about the old aeldari hotness the Blades of Khaine, and on the growth of the Bay Area killteam scene! Don’t miss out on tips for piloting the Aspect Warriors on this weeks podcast! Bay Area Championships May 25: https://www.lustersworkshop.com/event-details/bay-area-championships-2024 […]
title: JAKTP Episode 62: Blades of Khaine with Chris Bacchi!

description: Tom is joined by Chris, Ed and Jack to discuss 10th edition now it’s been a few months since launch. Is it a yay or a nay? Or was *insert edition* just better. All our handy social links: https://linktr.ee/6plusplusgaming
title: That 6+++ Show Episode 84: 10th Edition: Yay or Nay?
